transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon boliye na.
Customer: Uh, main keh raha hoon aapka 50 leads kara diya hai aap ek bar check kijiyega.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Aap check kar lijiye ek bar call pe hi aapne na customer care helpline pe call kiya tha na to concern open ho gaya tha iske regarding to humne wo kam kara diya check kijiye aap ek bar.
Customer: India mart India mart app open kijiye.
Executive: Ek to ha aa gaya 50 ha ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya.
Customer: Hai na 50 leads aapko pehle se the 50 lead allocate ho gaya hua hai theek hai. Uh iske alava sir mujhe aapse ye puchna tha jaise aapne yahan pe bahut sare product dale hue hain theek hai.
Customer: To marine marine ke sare accessories mein hum deal karte hain.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Marine equipment aur marine accessories sab to same hi hai na.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Aapka kuch product aise hai BUKs book marine engine aur book marine engine hamara out of stock pada hua hai to hum isme kar rahe hain deal abhi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Matlab kuch product aapke catalog mein aise dale hue hain jo ki aapne deactivate karke rakha hua hai to main usi ka idea leta hoon aapse ki usme karte hain to main activate kar do nahi nahi karte hain to aap mujhe ek bar confirm kar dijiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi marine engineering ka to apan karte hi hai.
Executive: Jaise ships life boat hai ek.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Batate jaiyega theek hai ship life boat karte hain isme.
Customer: Ji karta hoon.
Executive: Marine life rafts.
Customer: Haan raft ka bhi.
Executive: Theek hai. Uh
Customer: Fire alarms.
Executive: Uh fire alarm nahi usme bhi to nahi hai abhi nahi hai fire alarm me to nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek hai aapka Drager air bottle.
Customer: Haan wo sahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai aapka 30 HP outboard engine.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai. 4.7m FRP speed boat.
Customer: Barabar sahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Uh
Executive: Ek hai aapka life boat battery charger.
Customer: Haan wo bhi sahi hai.
Executive: Yanmar outboard marine engine.
Customer: Hmm wo bhi sahi hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai. To ye aapne deactivate karke kyu rakha hai?
Customer: Maine thodi react kiya kya lagta hai.
Executive: Achcha Unitor halogen leak detector.
Customer: Haan usko dekh wo kuch kam ka nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai usko deactivate rehne dete hain. Aapka hai refrigerant gas leak detector.
Customer: Ye bhi band rehne do.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai. To jo jo product aapne bataye sir usko active kar deta hoon jo jisme aap deal karte hain. Dusra jo leads aur inquiry sir aapko.
Customer: Sir main jis vyakti ne call kari.
Executive: Hello hello haan sir haan ji haan ji boliye.
Customer: Haan main keh raha hoon aap abhi all over India ki lead purchase karte hain ya fir apne aas pass ki location ki kar rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi all over India.
Customer: All over India ki kar rahe hain sir. To order value kitna rehna chahiye sir minimum?
Customer: Order value to kuch nahi kitna bhi chalega ek bhi chalega 50000 bhi 100 bhi chalega.
Executive: Dekhiye teen ghante pehle Gandhidham Gujarat ki ek lead aayi hai 10 piece ki marine accessories ki marine equipment ki.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan aap buyleads pe click karenge to aapko dikhega ye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Koi baat nahi koi baat nahi.

Customer: Mere ko nahi recent mein dekha nahi hai aisa to nahi hai.
Executive: Recent mein pehle click kijiye haan recent mein pehle click kijiye uske baad location mein India ka filter lagaiye sir niche location ka ek option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Okay India ka lagaiye haan dikha dikha dikha.
Executive: To aap kabhi bhi lead purchase kare na aap to yahin se kiya kijiye sir matlab aap pehle recent pe click kiya kijiye location mein all location ya fir India ka filter laga lijiye to aapko jo hai na sabse recent lead jo aaj ke date mein aayi hogi pehle wo dikhegi uske baad niche jaise jaise jate jayenge purani purani leads aapko dikhti jayegi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye bhi purchase nahi hui kahan chali gayi thi lagta hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi aapne purchase kiya hoga.
Customer: Haan aa gaya ji aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya.
Executive: Haan haan wo lead manager pe aa jata hai fir aapke.
Customer: Achcha achcha theek hai. To aap is tarike se purchase karenge na to achi lead purchase kar payenge matlab minutes wala aur ghanto wale leads mein fark itna rehta hai ki minute wale jo leads aate hain sir wo customer aapse thoda jyada discuss karenge aur ghanto wale mein ye problem aati hai ki aap late connect kar rahe hote hain customer ko to fir wo unka ye rehta hai ki meri baat ho gayi hai already kisi se ya fir discussion chal rahi hai kisi se. To koshish kijiye ki minutes wali lead aap recent lead ka use jyada kijiye recent lead pe click karke.
Customer: Ji sir ji sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Uh
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Baki sir calls wagera aap ache se receive kar rahe hain baki isme aapko kuch abhi tak jo doubt hai koi query hai koi confusion hai kisi cheez mein problem aa rahi hai to aap mujhe bata sakte hain.
Customer: Ji ji pakka sir thank you sir.
Executive: Hmm to mera wo wala number to aapka personal number mera save hi hai 7011 wala abhi aapke pass sir ek jo 50 leads wala tha uske liye aapke pass ek mail aayega feedback ka mere liye theek hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji sir.
Executive: To aap usko ek bar satisfied mark kar dijiyega sir theek hai.
Customer: Okay sir sir sir okay sir okay thank you so much sir thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed assistance with lead purchasing.

- Customer wanted to know about product deactivation.



Resolution:

- Executive allocated 50 leads to the customer.

- Executive explained how to purchase recent leads.

- Executive offered assistance with any doubts or queries.

- Executive will activate the products the customer deals in.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark the feedback mail as satisfied.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product deactivation, marine accessories, subscription
